description: Numbers that are congruent to {0, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6} mod 7.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,0,0,1,-1).
prog: (PARI) concat(0, Vec(x^2*(2+x+x^2+x^3+x^4+x^5)/((1+x)*(1+x+x^2)*(x^2-x+1)*(x-1)^2) + O(x^30))) \\ _Michel Marcus_, Oct 22 2014(MAGMA) [n: n in [0..100] | n mod 7 in [0,2,3,4,5,6]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 22 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
